text:
The first real photo of the flexible Motorola RAZR smartphone
05 Nov 2019, 16:54 by Ilya Sidorov
Designer Veniamin Geskin found on Weibo a real photo of the Motorola RAZR with a folding screen.
Judging by the picture, the smartphone will get an elongated display and a large indent from the bottom, like the RAZR V3 clamshell.
The presentation of the phone will take place on November 13.
Ben Geskin on Twitter? Just look at this bottom part? And people are really excited about this? #MotorolaRAZR (photo via sunniton weibo)? twitter.com
